verbose_text: Particularly, P2X7R activates the NLRP3 inflammasome leading to the release of the pro inflammatory cytokine, IL-1beta; however, P2X7R also induces cleavage of the amyloid precursor protein generating Abeta peptides or the neuroprotective fragment sAPPalpha.
evidence: P2X7R also induces cleavage of the amyloid precursor protein
